trustfund:
TF020771-FINANCING OF IMPORTS / SOMALIA,TF020510-ITALIAN GRANT/SOMALIA III
            COMMOD. IMPORT,TF023814-SJF-UK-AGRICULTURAL SEC ADJUSTMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The program would finance recurrent
            import requirements of the economy in support of significant
            policy reforms. These reforms include the establishment of
            an auction system for the allocation of foreign exchange and
            the elimination of subsidies on diesel fuel and tractor
            rentals. Also financed would be further liberalization of
            agricultural marketing and the expansion of private sector
            participation in supplying and distributing inputs to the
            economy. The program would provide technical assistance for
            the strengthening of key government institutions, mainly in agriculture.
